name: CliKintoneTest-133 Should return the error message when deleting records with valid and invalid API Tokens.
fullName: features/delete.feature#CliKintoneTest-133 Should return the error message when deleting records with valid and invalid API Tokens.

steps.name: Given Load app ID of the app "app_for_delete" as env var: "APP_ID"
And Load app token of the app "app_for_delete" with exact permissions "view,delete" as env var: "API_TOKEN"
When I run the command with args "record delete --app $APP_ID --base-url $$TEST_KINTONE_BASE_URL --api-token $API_TOKEN,INVALID_API_TOKEN_2 --yes"
Then I should get the exit code is non-zero
And The output error message should match with the pattern: "\[520] \[GAIA_IA02] The specified API token does not match the API token generated via an app."

labels.name: suite
labels.value: CliKintoneTest-133 Should return the error message when deleting records with valid and invalid API Tokens.
